summary: Security-focused Engineer and Systems Architect with 10+ years building secure applications and infrastructure at Google, USAA, and FedEx. Expert in mobile security, cloud security architecture, and threat detection with proven impact: 99.9% uptime maintenance, 40% cost reduction through security optimization, and secure systems serving millions of users. Combines deep technical security expertise with application development to build resilient, secure distributed systems.

experience.title: Security Engineer & AI Systems Architect
experience.description: Architect and implement comprehensive security controls for AI content generation system with focus on content safety, data protection, and secure infrastructure
achievements: Architected and deployed production-ready AI system with comprehensive security controls including content safety validation achieving 99.5% safety score and zero security incidents
Implemented secure multi-modal AI pipeline with automated threat detection, achieving 30-60 second processing with 99.9% uptime and comprehensive security monitoring
Deployed fault-tolerant security architecture using encrypted containers and secure load balancers, supporting 500+ concurrent users with zero data breaches
Optimized security infrastructure costs by 40% through efficient security resource management, automated threat detection, and intelligent security scaling policies
Built comprehensive security monitoring and alerting system using CloudWatch and custom security metrics for proactive threat detection and incident response
Implemented Infrastructure as Code security practices using Terraform with security-first configuration and automated security compliance validation
Developed secure CI/CD pipeline with automated security testing, reducing deployment time from hours to minutes while maintaining zero-vulnerability deployments
Integrated distributed content safety system with real-time threat analysis and automated incident response capabilities

Implemented automated security testing and deployment pipelines ensuring secure delivery of critical mobile infrastructure security updates

Implemented advanced security caching strategies and secure API architecture, reducing security incident response time by 40% and improving financial data protection

Designed automated security testing pipeline achieving 70%+ security coverage and reducing financial security risks through comprehensive security validation

Built resilient financial security microservices architecture supporting critical financial services with disaster recovery and security incident response capabilities
Mentored 5+ developers on secure development practices, financial security automation, and scalable security architecture design
